channel.title: MMXVII - by YANEECK [Album]
channel.description:
Hi Everyone,
First, it’s not a track, but 15 tracks, so I hope you’ll forgive me breaking the “one track - one thread” rule. Anyway, I’d like to share with you all one big news for me. After almost one year of playing and experimenting with Auxy, I finally made a full album of electronic music that I personally like: rather light and calm as in Jean-Michel Jarre’s “Oxygène”, but sometimes also dynamic and rhythmic as Laserdance or a Polish musician Marek Biliński’s artistic work.
Long story short, let me introduce you to my first music album ever: https://soundcloud.com/yaneeck/sets/mmxvii It is also available in streaming services and internet stores.
IMPORTANT: All tracks (except for "June") were made in Auxy. It sure is a brilliant application and it let my creativity shine :slight_smile:
Enjoy listening!

item.title: MMXVII - by YANEECK [Album]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Awesome work! Agreed with @MisterMaster those bass lines are entrancing, so good

item.title: MMXVII - by YANEECK [Album]
item.dc:creator: yaneeck
item.description:
Thank you, @MisterMaster, I appreciate your feedback and I’m glad you like the music.

Read full topic

item.title: MMXVII - by YANEECK [Album]
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
I listened to the entire album tonight and loved it Yaneeck. It’s a great first album. Upbeat at times (Feb) and then deeper and reflective (Sept). Your bass lines in particular, are a highlight which I started listening out for.

Also like your album cover. You should post it above.

Thanks for sharing your music.

Read full topic
